plot: A Tohono O'odham family and their experiences living in South West Tucson during the 1970's. An adaptation of Byrd Baylor's novel "Yes Is Better Than No".
title: Yes Is Better Than No
plot_es: A Tohono O'odham family and their experiences living in South West Tucson during the 1970's. An adaptation of Byrd Baylor's novel "Yes Is Better Than No".
plot_en: A Tohono O'odham family and their experiences living in South West Tucson during the 1970's. An adaptation of Byrd Baylor's novel "Yes Is Better Than No".
